thread.title: Nice location in Paris
thread.title_full: Nice location in Paris - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Marais Grands Boulevards, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sihanoukville
title: Nice location in Paris
text:
The location is superb if you, like us, are in town for the first time and want to be near many of the towns main attractions. 10 mins walk and you are at the Pompidou center, and a further 10 mins and you are in Notre Dame. Subway station right araund the corner, and bus stop right outside the door.
You have litterarily hundreds of restaurants within the same 10 mins radius.
The main road passing the hotes has a lot of traffic, but were not bothered with it at night. We had a corner room, and it was nice. A bit small perhaps if you are planning to stay for a week or more, but with everything you will excpect to find in a hotelroom and it was all working. Staff in reception are very nice and welcoming. They all speak fluent english (as to my surprise did a lot of the people we met in town). Breakfast was good, but a little excpencive. All in all recommended.
Room Tip: Recommend a corner room. See more room tips
